creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: triangular cluster of butterflies in purples, blues, reds, and yellows; yellowish and pink gradient background with ochre colored horizontal band across top
marks: Signature, Title, Date, and Mark bottom margin in pencil: [蝶たち－集う] {Chōchō tachi at
title: Butterflies
